description: This beef and stout stew is worth the wait, perfect served with mash or crusty bread for mopping up the sauce.
name: Beef & Stout Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g carrots, peeled and chopped into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large, deep casserole and cook the beef in batches for 2 minutes on each side to brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the remaining oil, onions and carrots to the casserole and cook for 5-6 minutes. Sprinkle with flour and cook for 1 minute. Add the beef back into the pan with its juices.
Add the rosemary, crumbled beef stock cube, stout, honey and bay leaves and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 2.5 hours.
Remove the rosemary and bay leaves and serve.
